name: Baldi's and Learning 2: The trip!
description:
Once you got out of that crazy school, Balloon is not done with you yet. and for some reason, you were knocked out and woke up in a very weird and disturbing place. You walked over to the door and oh great again! looks like we have to deal with balloon once again!

Credits to emeraldlegendURL for ze bwfg asset.

I hope you enjoy this mod!
